Which of the following data sets is most likely to provide reliable information about the evolutionary relationships among these three snail species?

choices.label: Trophic level and <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> analysis
Location of fossils and shell orientation
Shell composition and location of fossils

content.answer: Location of fossils and shell orientation

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
